At the age of nine, Darwin entered

Dr. Butler’s boarding school

in Shrewsbury.

Do you know

what my favorite saying is?

Yes, it’s “Don’t be

friends with someone

you don’t respect.”

Right?

Right.

Now this is a good

school, so you

should study

hard and make

lots of friends.

Although his father liked the school,

Dr. Butler’s school was not a good match for the ever-inquisitive Darwin.

Yawn.

At the very rigid and strict school,

most of his classes were nothing but ancient history and geography.

19
